author: philip
msg: Set the correct op_depth in NODES for simple deletes.  This
fixes some of the SVN_WC__NODES FAILS but introduces others
as a copy that replaces doesn't always the same op_depth as
(construct_like_arg): New, to factor out common code.

author: bryanduxbury
msg: THRIFT-881. csharp: add csharp to the tutorial
This patch adds a tutorial for CSharp. It also moves the 'test' client and server into the tutorial, because they were not being used by the tests.
